dimension:
37 1/8 x 11 in. (94.3 x 27.94 cm) (image)
71 3/4 x 15 15/16 in. (182.25 x 40.48 cm) (overall, without roller)
inscription:
Poem: 

Taware-me no
kotoba wo mane te
nago_ hiku
haru no yanagi no 
midori yo_yo_

It is like 
courtesans\' speech.
The green wands 
of a willow in spring
fall long in the end. 

by Shinratei
(Seal: Takara)
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
title: Strolling Prostitute
